qas.question: How many alumni does Olin Business School have worldwide?
What is the amount of Olin Business School's endowment as of 2004?
Who provided the donation that enabled the opening  Simon Hall?
When were Knight and Bauer Halls dedicated?
How much money did John E. Simon donate?
In what year was the Bauer Foundation established?
How much did Simon Hall cost to build?
How much did the Knight Hall cost to build?
How much did the Bauer Hall cost to build?

context: Olin has a network of <a0_0>more than 16,000 alumni<a0_0/> worldwide. Over the last several years, the school’s endowment has increased to <a1_0>$213 million<a1_0/> (2004) and annual gifts average <b5_0>$12 million<b5_0/> per year.[citation needed] Simon Hall was opened in <a2_0>1986<a2_0/> after a donation from <a3_0>John E. Simon<a3_0/>. On <a4_0>May 2, <b6_0>2014<b6_0/><a4_0/>, the <b7_0>$90 million<b7_0/> conjoined Knight and Bauer Halls were dedicated, following a <b8_0>$15 million<b8_0/> gift from Charles F. Knight and Joanne Knight and a <b9_0>$10 million<b9_0/> gift from George and Carol Bauer through the Bauer Foundation.
